body_content.explanation: not intentionally choosing some things instead of others :
examples: Trawling is an efficient but highly unselective way of catching fish.
Medical radiation treatment is unselective: the rays damage all the tissue in their path.

body_content.explanation: An unselective school, college, or university is one that students can go to without passing an examination:
examples: She said there was no evidence that selective schools produced better results than schools that were unselective.
I prefer the unselective small colleges that are inclusive rather than exclusive.
